tracks.title: Lost in Time
tracks.description: A cinematic piece that takes you on a journey through time and emotion.

tracks.title: OVERTIME! - Clash Royale Anthem
tracks.genre: Epic Orchestral Rock, High-Energy Gaming Anthem
tracks.description: Music has the power to connect us all. Explore my newest composition—a high-energy Clash Royale anthem that captures the chaotic adrenaline of overtime battles. Every note tells a story of panicked euphoria and mocking victory. Watch the full video, feel the music, and let it resonate with your soul. [Genre: Epic Orchestral Rock | BPM: 110-130 | Mood: Panicked euphoria, toxic triumph, chaotic adrenaline]
tracks.lyrics:
[VERSE 1 - Building Tension, Frustration Mounting]
(Emotion: Anxious determination mixed with creeping dread)
Three crowns away, sixty seconds on the clock
Enemy drops Mega Knight, my whole push just STOPS
Seven elixir war crime falling from the sky
Spawn damage obliterates everything I tried
He's spamming that emote, that cursed laughing sound
"HE HE HE HAW" echoing, my sanity unwound
Midladder nightmare, here we go again
MK, E-Barbs, Wizard, Rage - emotional pain

[PRE-CHORUS - Panic Setting In]
(Emotion: Heart-pounding anxiety, existential gaming crisis)
Elixir bar is empty, towers falling down
One mistake and I'm the clown
Overtime music hits, my palms are DRENCHED
This is where legends born or dreams get wrenched

[CHORUS - OVERTIME EXPLOSION]
(Emotion: Pure chaotic adrenaline, victory-or-death intensity)
OVERTIME! OVERTIME! THE MUSIC'S IN MY VEINS!
Heart rate at two hundred, this is PURE INSANE!
One tower down, we're racing for the win
HE HE HE HAW if I lose again!
OVERTIME! OVERTIME! No room for mistakes!
Everything I've got, my sanity at stake!
Mega Knight jumping, E-Barbs at the bridge
This is Clash Royale - living on the EDGE!

[VERSE 2 - Toxic Warfare]
(Emotion: Bitter rage mixed with dark humor)
Every midladder player got the SAME deck list
Overleveled nightmares that shouldn't exist
"Just counter with Mini Pekka" - BRO I HAD NO ELIXIR
Your Firecracker, Wall Breakers - certified KILLER
Rage spell incoming, here comes the flood
Elite Barbarians running, thirsting for blood
I'm cycling Skeletons, praying to RNG
One wrong placement, that's GG for me

[BRIDGE - Breaking Point Emotions]
(Emotion: Manic laughter mixed with tears, gaming psychosis)
I've deleted my account five times this week
But I'm BACK tomorrow, emotionally weak
"Jarvis, I'm low on karma, post another meme"
Coping through humor - the Clasher's theme!
My fragile push, your seven-elixir "NO"
Spawn damage deletion, watch my spirits go LOW
But in this final minute, everything's on fire
Overtime adrenaline, taking me HIGHER!

[FINAL CHORUS - Ultimate Climax]
(Emotion: Transcendent gaming ecstasy mixed with inevitable doom)
OVERTIME! OVERTIME! SIXTY SECONDS LEFT!
Victory or crushing, soul-destroying death!
Rocket to the tower, it's a photo finish race
HE HE HE HAW stamped across my FACE!
OVERTIME! OVERTIME! This is what we LIVE FOR!
Toxic emote spam, settling the score!
Mega Knight META, E-Barbs at the gate
In Clash Royale overtime - WE EMBRACE OUR FATE!

[OUTRO - Post-Battle Exhaustion]
(Emotion: Hollow victory/defeat, emotional devastation)
Game over, replay saved, what just happened there?
Three-star destruction or one tower nightmare
Either way I'm queueing up the next one RIGHT NOW
Clash Royale addiction - take another bow
HE HE HE HAW... HE HE HE HAW...
(fading into distance with maniacal echo)
